records.browseQuery: SELECT `payment`.`id` AS `primarykey`, `recipient_name`, `MSISDN`, `trx_id`, `request_date`, `orderType`.`title`, `debit_amount` FROM `payment` LEFT JOIN `orderType` ON (`payment`.`order_type` = `orderType`.`ID`) WHERE `trx_status` NOT IN ('Completed', 'Failed') ORDER BY `payment`.`id` DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `rowCount` FROM `payment` WHERE `trx_status` NOT IN ('Completed', 'Failed') LEFT JOIN `orderType` ON (`payment`.`order_type` = `orderType`.`ID`) ORDER BY `payment`.`id` DESC
